Member.name: ProduceAsync_Common
Member.returns: A Task which will complete with the corresponding delivery report for this request.
Member.remarks: If you require strict ordering of delivery reports to be maintained, you should use the Produce method which provides these via a callback on a single poll thread. The Tasks returned by ProduceAsync are completed on arbitrary thread pool threads and so they can be executed out of order.

A byte array from which to extract the message key (possibly null).
The start offset of the message key in the byte array parameter. If is set to null, then keyOffset must be set to 0.
The number of bytes to extract from the parmeter to use as the message key. If is set to null, then keyLength must be set to 0.
